    • GameModel

      public GameModel (boolean advancedRules, List<String> usernames, int numberOfPlayers, List<Color> colors, List<Wizard> wizards)
      It is the model of the game
      Parameters:
      advancedRules - whether the game has advanced rules
      usernames - the list of the players
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players
      colors - the list of colors
      wizards - the list of wizards

    • resetAssistants

      public void resetAssistants()
      This method is used at the beginning of a round. The boolean isAssistantPlayed inform that the player has already played an assistant card.

      public boolean moveFromSelectedCloud (int indexOfCloud) throws CloudAlreadySelectedException

      Parameters:
      indexOfCloud - is the selected cloud
      Returns:
      whether the operation was successful
      Throws:
      CloudAlreadySelectedException - is thrown if another player has already selected the provided cloud

    • playAssistant

      public boolean playAssistant (int indexOfAssistant) throws AssistantAlreadyPlayedException, PlanningPhaseEndedException
      Used during the planning phase of the turn
      Parameters:
      indexOfAssistant - is the selected assistant
      Returns:
      whether the operation was successful
      Throws:
      AssistantAlreadyPlayedException - is thrown if another player already played the given assistant
      PlanningPhaseEndedException - is thrown if the planning phase has ended

    • establishRoundOrder

      public void establishRoundOrder()
      put in order players according to the assistant card played by each player.

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature (int jumps) throws GameEndedException
      sums the selected postman movements to the number of jumps mnFuturePos uses the module function to establish the correct future position of MotherNature
      Parameters:
      jumps - number of steps that MotherNature has to do
      Returns:
      true if mother nature changed her position
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • playCharacter

      public boolean playCharacter (int indexOfCharacter)
      verifies if the character can be played and if it can be played this method removes coin from the player and gives them to coinReserve.
      Parameters:
      indexOfCharacter - is the position of the character played
      Returns:
      true if the character can be played and paid.

    • effect

      public boolean effect (CharactersParametersPayload answer) throws GameEndedException, UnplayableEffectException
      Used to play the characters effects
      Parameters:
      answer - is the payload with the selected parameters
      Returns:
      whether the effect was successful
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - is thrown if an end game condition is met
      UnplayableEffectException - is thrown if the provided parameters are illegal
